title: Asante Kotoko Communications manager shocked as Hearts of Oak blocks him on twitter
text:
18:55 CET Asante Kotoko Communications manager shocked as Hearts of Oak blocks him on twitter - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
The Communications Manager of Kumasi Asante Kotoko Kwaku Ahenkorah has expressed dismay at the twitter handle of rivals Accra Hearts of Oka for blocking him and the Kotoko twitter handle. 
According to Kwaku Ahenkorah it appears obsolete and outmoded for their rivals to be behaving in that manner in the 21st century following the Appeals Committee's decision to revert the club's deducted points. 
Writing on his facebook wall questioned the rationale behind the block insisting the two clubs are too old for such social media gimmickry. 
'Just realized Hearts of Oak have remarkably blocked me and @Asantekotoko_SC on twitter. Aren't the two clubs too old for this? Ahenkorah questioned. 
Tension has enveloped the two clubs over the past few days after the Appeals Committee of the Ghana Football Association upheld the appeal of the Porcupine Warriors aiding them to get their deducted six points back. 
Asante Kotoko appealed against the decision of the Disciplinary Committee which ruled that the Elite Clubs Competition matches were not official matches and therefore, Obed Owusu could not have served his suspension by sitting out in the Kotoko vs. Dunkwa United match. 
The player was therefore adjudged to be unqualified when he featured for Kotoko against Hearts on the 2nd August 2015 after he had featured for Kotoko in three previous matches upon his 3rd caution. 
As a result, Kotoko suffered a forfeiture of the said match by deduction of six points from their accumulated points and Hearts were awarded 3 goals and 3 points in accordance with article 34(2) of the General Regulations of the FA and a fine of GHÂ¢5,000.00 was also imposed on Kotoko. 
The Phobians per the points deduction have moved from the 4th position and now occupy the 13th position on the league table though the 2014/15 First Capital Plus Premiership is over.
